Il veut utiliser les bénéfices du prêt pour réinvestir dans son activité. Il ambitionne scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Karim is the representative for the 'Songtaaba Karim' Group. He is married and father to two children. The youngest is four years old and the eldest is seven years old. One of his children currently attends school and Karim is responsible for two people.

Karim has been growing vegetables for five years. He buys his supplies in the surrounding villages. His loan will buy seven sacks of fertilizer and five boxes of herbicide. Karim will use his profits to reinvest in his business. His ambition is to provide for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy 7 sacks of fertilizer and 5 boxes of herbicide.

loans.name: Adjo  Irène

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Adjo est une femme âgée de 44 ans habitant à Tokoin. Adjo est une revendeuse des pagnes et des plats en plastiques qui s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois  au marché et le revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Pour ce fait, Adjo sollicite ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de pièces de pagnes et de plats en vue de bien revendre et de gagner une marge bénéficiaire qui servira à venir en aide à son mari pour soutenir les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Adjo is forty-four years old, married and mother to two children. She lives in Tokoin and sells pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) and plastic dishes. She buys her stock four times a month from the market and resells it on foot in neighbouring districts.

Adjo has requested this loan to buy dozens more pagnes and dishes to sell and earn more profit. This will help her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy 3 dozen pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing) and 8 dozen dishes.

loans.name: Aimé

texts.fr: Aimé est une veuve femme  avec six enfants à charge. Aimé est âgée de 35 ans et vit à Agoè où elle exerce son activité de restauratrice de riz et du haricot. Aimé s’approvisionne du nécessaire servant à la préparation deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Aimé sollicite ce crédit pour commander des sacs de riz, du haricot et des tas de condiments en vue de bien revendre puis de gagner plus de bénéfices et de venir en aide à ses enfants aux besoins de la famille et d’améliorer les conditions de vie quotidiennes de ceux-ci.
texts.en:
Aimé is thirty-five years old, widowed and has six children in her care. She lives in Agoè and runs a restaurant selling rice and beans. She buys her supplies twice a month from the market and sells her food from her home and on foot in neighbouring districts.

Aimé has requested this loan to buy sacks of rice and beans and other food ingredients to sell and earn more profit. This will help her provide for her family and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of rice, 1 sack of beans and 5 quantities of other food ingredients.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Abla est une femme mariée âgée de 43 ans qui vit à Adidogomé. Mère de quatre enfants, Abla est une marchande des condiments qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant pour gagner ses revenus. Pour commander des sacs d’oignons, Abla nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement et pouvoir mieux revendre puis réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de venir en aide à son mari à couvrir les charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Abla is forty-three years old, married and mother to four children. She lives in Adidogomé and sells food items. She buys her stock twice a month from the market and resells it on foot in neighbouring districts.

Abla has requested this loan to buy sacks of onions to sell and earn more profit. This will help her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of onions.

loans.name: Erlin Ebelio

texts.es:
El Señor Erlin, tiene 26 años de edad habita en la cominidad de la Libertad al Orinte de Honduras,  convive con su esposa, es padre de 1 hijo,  y se dedica a la Agricultura y Caficultura, desde hace 5 y años su propiedad esta hubicada en un lugar muy bueno para estas actividades.
Erlin solicita el prestamo para la ferilizacion de su finca y asi obtener una mejor cosecha, y asi mismo alargarle la vida a su finca de Café para tener buena tierra y que esta le produzca buenos frutos.
Erlin su sueño es ser un buen productor y exportar calidad, con esto sacaria a su familia adelante que es un anhelo.
Trojes, Honduras - octubre del 2015
texts.en:
Erlin is 26 years old and lives in the Libertad al Orinte community in Honduras. He lives with his wife and is father to one son. Erlin has been working in farming and growing coffee for five years. His property is in a good location for these kinds of work.

Erlin is applying for this loan in order to fertilise his farm and thus harvest a good yield and lengthen the lifespan of his coffee crops. With good earth, Erlin can produce good crops.

Erlin's dream is to produce and export a quality product. He can then help his family to move forward.

Trojes, Honduras; October 2015

loans.use: to buy fertilisers for his land.

loans.name: Estela Rossemary

texts.es:
Estela comparte sus días con su esposo de 45 años de edad y sus hijos de 15, 10 y 7 años, la familia entera se esfuerza para atender una venta de ropa usada, con lo que obtienen los ingresos para cumplir con sus obligaciones, tiene su negocio desde hace 8 años, está ubicado en el mercado municipal y lo abre todos los días.
Al acercarse la temporada de fines de año se ve en el necesidad de solicitar un crédito con el que podrá comprar fardos de ropa usada, los cuales contienen ropa variada, así tendrá mucha facilidad para atraer a más clientes.
Su sueño más grande es tener un negocio rentable y así apoyar a sus hijos para que continúen estudiando y tengan un futuro prometedor.
texts.en:
Estela spends her days with her 45-year-old husband and their children, ages 15, 10 and 7 years old. The whole family works hard to sell used clothing, and uses the income to pay for necessities. Estela has had the business for eight years. It is located in the town market, and open every day.

With the end of year approaching, Estela needs to apply for a loan in order to buy packs of used clothing with various items; she will then be able to attract customers more easily.

Estela's biggest dream is to have a profitable and support her children so that they continue in education and have a promising future.

loans.use: to buy packs of used clothing with various items; she will then be able to attract more customers.

loans.name: Philomène

texts.fr: Philomène est une femme âgée de 44 ans qui vit à Agoè. Divorcée et mère de trois enfants, Philomène fabrique et revend de produits médicalisés en boîtes et s’approvisionne du nécessaire pour la fabrication cinq fois par mois au marché et le revend de quartier en quartier. Philomène demande ce prêt pour commander des cartons de pommades médicalisées en vue de bien revendre puis de gagner des bénéfices afin de pouvoir répondre aux attentes de ses clients et aider son mari à prendre en charges les dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Philomène is forty-four years old, divorced and mother to three children. She lives in Agoè and makes and sells jars of medical ointment. She buys her supplies five times a month from the market and resells it on foot in neighbouring districts.

Philomène has requested this loan to buy boxes of medical ointment to sell and earn more profit. This will respond to the demands of her customers and help her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy 9 boxes of medical ointment.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr: Abla est une femme célibataire de 39 ans habitant à Agoè. Sans enfant, Abla est une marchande de pagnes qui s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché et le revend en parcourant dans les quartiers environnant. Pour commander des pièces de pagnes, Abla demande ce prêt afin d’acquérir un grand nombre de stock et mieux revendre puis avoir une bonne marge bénéficiaire et soutenir sa famille dans certaines charges et pouvoir subvenir à certains besoins quotidiens.
texts.en:
Abla is thirty-nine years old, single and has no children. She lives in Agoè and sells pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing). She buys her stock three times a month from the market and resells it on foot in neighbouring districts.

Abla has requested this loan to buy more pagnes to sell and earn more profit. This will help her to support her family with some of their expenses and provide for her day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy 7 pagnes (traditional, wrap-around clothing).

loans.name: M'na

texts.fr: M’na est une femme au foyer âgée de 51 ans qui vit à Agoè. Mère de quatre enfants, M’na prépare du fromage de soja à domicile et le revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant. M’na s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché et sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de soja. Grâce à l’épargne qui en résultera suite à une bonne vente, M’na va pouvoir aider son mari à payer les frais scolaire de leurs enfants dès ce début de la rentrée scolaire et prendre en charge certaines dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
M'na is fifty-one years old, a housewife and mother to four children. She lives in Agoè and prepares and sells soya cheese. She buys her stock four times a month from the market and resells the cheese on foot in neighbouring districts.

M'na has requested this loan to buy more sacks of soya beans to earn more profit. This will help her husband provide for schooling for their children for the next school year, and pay for the day-to-day expenses of their family.

loans.use: to buy 4 sacks of soya beans.

loans.name: Kotognongontala Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mory est âgée de 40 ans c’est un Paysan résidant au Mali avec sa femme et ses 5 enfants dont l'age varie entre  de 1 à 9 ans. C’est un paysan qui  fait l’embouche  de bovine il y’a 7ans de cela. C’est  lui qui a la corde du bœuf sur la photo. Un homme très brave dans son activité et honorant toujours ses engagements avec  le RMCR  et digne de confiance.
Il achète ses animaux dans les villages environnants, après les avoir embauchés il les revend dans le marchés hebdomadaire des villages voisins,pour avoir un bénéfice approximatif de 35 000 FCFA par mois ce qui lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille(nourriture habillement soins de santé etc..)
Mory a fait appel à la caisse RMCR pour agrandir son activité d’embouche  son rêve est de fréquenter les grands marchés  de bétails dans les jours à venir, payer un terrain en ville et scolariser tous  ces enfants.
texts.en:
Mory is forty years old, comes from Mali and is a farmer. He lives with his wife and their five children (who range in age from one to nine years old). Mory has been rearing cattle for seven years. He is seen in the photo holding the cow's rope.

Mory is very courageous and trustworthy in his business activities and always repays his loans from the field partner, RMCR, on time. He buys his livestock from the surrounding villages, fattens them up and then resells them at the weekly markets in local villages. He earns approximately 35,000 francs CFA a month and this allows him to provide for the needs of his family (food, clothing, healthcare, etc).

Mory is requesting this loan to expand his business by buying animals at the coming large animal markets. He would also like to buy a plot of land in town and pay for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy cattle for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Jean Baptiste

texts.fr:
Jean Baptiste  a 24 ans, il est marié. Le couple  a un fils  de 03 ans. Sa femme l’appuie dans  l'exercice de son activité, elle s’occupe aussi de la livraison. Il   est actuellement à son 3ème prêt. En 2012 il  a été dans la vente de charbon, mais l’activité  n`a pas été rentable. En plus de cela le propriétaire a repris le local. A ce jour, il entreprend l’activité de fabrication de portefeuille car ses beaux-parents lui ont appris le métier. Pour financer cette activité, il a dû vendre ses biens à la campagne.  Les produits sont livrés sur commande.
Il habite chez ses  beaux-parents.Son objectif est de pouvoir construire sa propre maison en 2016 puis qu’il a déjà acheté quelques matériaux pour la construction. La construction sera faite par lui  même, car il a déjà travaillé comme maçon.
texts.en:
Jean Baptiste is twenty-four years old, married and has a three-year-old son. His wife works with him in his business and is responsible for deliveries.

This will be the third loan for Jean Baptiste. In 2012, he was selling charcoal but it was not a profitable business and he lost the use of his business premises. He decided to begin making and selling pocketbooks. His parents-in-law taught him how to make them and he sold various assets to fund his new business. He makes the pocketbooks to order.

Currently, Jean Baptiste lives with his parents-in-law but his aim is to be able to build his own home in 2016, he has already purchased a quantity of materials necessary to do this. He will build the house himself as he used to work as a building mason.

loans.use: to buy leather, imitation leather, linings, fastenings, thread, glue and cardboard.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa es una joven emprendedora de 21 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de mercancía como ropa y accesorios en aceros, es una mujer responsable, activa y soñadora la cual se trazó una meta a largo plazo de comprar una vivienda, siendo este el principal motivo por el cual inicio su actividad.
Buscando salir adelante, posicionarse, adquirir clientela, ser reconocida en el sector, tener continuidad y material para trabajar, la joven quiere solicitar un préstamo el cual invertirá en surtido de ropa juvenil para hombre y dama y en bisutería hecha en acero.
texts.en: Luisa is a young 21-year old entrepreneur who works selling merchandise such as clothing and steel accessories. She is a responsible, active and visionary woman who has drawn up a long-term goal of buying a house. This is the main reason that she started working. Looking to get ahead, position herself, get customers, be well-known in the area, have continuity and materials for work, this young girl wants to ask for a loan to buy a supply of youth clothing for males and females, and steel jewelry.

loans.use: to buy a supply of youth clothing for males and females, and steel jewelry.

loans.name: Alex Eduardo

texts.es:
Alex es un joven de 22 años de edad, el cual inicio un negocio de venta de frutas y verduras con el humilde propósito de ayudar económicamente a su madre, no piensa en nada que no sea ella, quiere que su negocio prospere y mantener esa mujer que tanto ama y que le dio la vida.
Inicio a principios del presente año, desde entonces ha luchado por mantenerse y sobrevivir ante la fuerte competencia que hay en la zona.
Ya posicionado y con clientela fija, puede trabajar con mayor fluidez, espera seguir por esa buena senda y lograr captar la atención de un mayor número de clientes.
El cliente pensando en expandirse, contar con mayor cantidad y variedad de surtido solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras, guardando capital para ir surtiendo poco a poco, entendiendo que son productos con un tiempo de vida corto.
texts.en:
Alex is a young 22-year old who started a business selling fruits and vegetables with the humble proposition of helping his mother economically. He does not think of anybody other than her and he wants his business to prosper so he can support this woman who he loves dearly and whom he would give his life for.

He started at the beginning of this year and since then he has fought to keep up and survive against the tough competition that there is in the area. He is already set up with regular customers and he can work smoothly. He hopes to continue on this right path and manage to capture the attention of a greater number of customers. Thinking of expanding, and having a larger quantity and variety of supplies, he is asking for a loan to buy fruits and vegetables. He will save the money to gradually supply, as he understands that his products have a short shelf-life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Florinda Oliva

texts.es:
La señora Florinda  de 29  años de edad es casada y  vive con su esposo y su  hijo en casa propia,  se dedica desde hace 04 años al negocio de venta de ropa  usada, vende pantalones, camisas, chores, bóxer, licras, camisetas, vestidos, faldas, brasieres, etc.
Doña Florinda sus clientes son todos sus vecinos amistades y personas de las comunidades vecinas, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Florinda está solicitando el préstamo para compra de ropa clasificada como blusas, vestidos, pantalones, camisas, etc.  Con el apoyo de este  préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Octubre del  2015.
texts.en:
Florinda is 29-years old, married and lives with her husband and son in their own home. For 4 years now she has worked in a business selling used clothing. She sells pants, shirts, underwear, boxers, tights, t-shirts, dresses, skirts, bras, etc. Her customers are all of her friendly neighbors and the people in the neighboring communities. She is an entrepreneurial woman with wishes of getting ahead and she fights every day to improve her quality of life.

Florinda is asking for a loan to buy clothing such as blouses, dresses, pants, shirts, etc. With the support of this loan, she hopes to improve her income and also her quality of life. She is a customer with hopes of working with Prisma. Her dream is to have a good business and increase her clientele, while at the same time improving her future with her family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2015.

loans.use: to buy blouses, dresses, pants, shirts, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Dúo Nueva Peronia Group

texts.es: Dúo Nueva Peronia José Alfonso de 51 años de edad, es padre de un joven menor de edad. El negocio al cual él se dedica es a la venta de tortas del chavo y es taxista de su comunidad. Ya hace varios años el tiene su negocio y es muy conocido por las personas de su comunidad. Nuevamente solicita un crédito para hacerle mejoras a su negocio y desea comprar un congelador para mantener sus productos en mejor estado para sus clientes. El sueño de José Alfonso es tener varios negocios y así poder darle un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
The duo of Nueva Peronia.

José Alfonso is 51-years old. He is the father of a young kid. The business he works in is selling children's cakes and he is a taxi driver in his community. He has had his business for several years and is very well-known by the people in his community. Currently he is asking for a loan to make improvements to his business and he wants to buy a freezer to keep his products in the best state for his customers. José Alfonso's dream is to have several businesses and this way he can give his family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy the equipment for a freezer.

loans.name: Libia Cristina

texts.es:
Libia es una mujer de 52 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos de 14 y 16 años de edad, se dedica a confeccionar su línea propia de ropa, un negocio con altibajos ya que el mercado está muy saturado de ropa, ella se ingenia la manera de confeccionar prendas diferentes que impacten y atraigan a sus clientes.
Libia trabaja arduamente 10 horas diarias, ingeniando, diseñando, confeccionando telas, sabe que de ella y de su esposo depende el presente y futuro de sus muchachos.
Su humilde deseo es que sus hijos siempre tengan la oportunidad de estudiar, que la falta de dinero no sea una excusa para capacitarse y seguirá trabajando para cumplir su meta.
Actualmente la cliente solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina fileteadora, ayudara mucho a agilizar sus procesos de confección.
texts.en: Libia is a 52-year old woman. She is married and has two children, ages 14 and 16. She works making her own clothing line, a business with ups and downs because the market is very saturated with clothing. She manages creating different items of clothing that impact and attract her customers. Libia works hard for 10 hours a day, devising, designing, and making fabric. She knows that the future of her children depends on her and her husband. Her humble wish is that her children always have the opportunity to study, that lack of money is never an excuse to be limited and she will continue working to complete her goal. Currently she is asking for a loan to buy a filleting machine (a type of sewing machine) which will help a lot to carry out her manufacturing processes.

loans.use: to buy a filleting machine (a type of sewing machine) which will help a lot to carry out her manufacturing processes.

loans.name: Moreen

texts.en:
Moreen is a 23-year-old farmer. She is a mother who is hardworking, humble, and responsible. Since she was a girl, thanks to her parents' teaching, she learned to do all of the tasks involved in farming. She is a smallholder farmer based in Kitale, Kenya, which is a town near the famous Rift valley escarpment. Moreen and her husband are blessed with a lovely family. 

Moreen has been a farmer for more than three years. She keeps poultry for eggs, cows for milk, and grows maize and vegetables for sale. She also engages in small businesses on the side whenever an opportunity crosses her path. Despite the rapid fluctuation of prices in the market, Moreen is very passionate and optimistic about the future of farming in Kenya. 

Moreen is seeking a loan to expand her farm. She intends to buy farm implements. This move is quite a big deal for her. With a loan, Moreen seeks to continue growing a variety of crops, but on a greater scale. The demand for vegetables and other greens in Kitale and other parts of the country is very high. Income from this venture will negate the high farming expenses she has to deal with currently.

In the long run, with increased income, she will finally be able to satisfy her family’s basic needs. She stated, “In the future, I will be able to provide food for my family and also educate my two children.”

You can help Moreen to accomplish all of her dreams and to become a great smallholder farmer; a loan will do a lot for her.

loans.use: to buy farm implements

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a dedicated, determined, and honest mother of a lovely family. She is based in Nkubu, Kenya. The rich soil of this area makes it one of the nation’s biggest banana growing regions, lending it the nickname of “the banana region”. 

For the past 10 years, Fridah has been involved in mixed farming and her primary source of income has been selling milk, eggs, maize and a variety of food crops. These ventures have allowed her to earn a decent income. 

Fridah passionately loves poultry farming, but the biggest challenge she faces is the lack of funds. However, this challenge has not made her give up. She mobilized other enterprising women like her in her village. 

Fridah is requesting a loan to buy seeds and expand her horticulture farming. Having gone through training on loan management, she is educated on how to utilize the loan and save more money. Through this loan, Fridah will generate enough income to take care of the farming costs and expand her horticulture business to international markets.

If there is someone you should consider lending to, that person is Fridah!

loans.use: to buy seeds and expand her horticulture farming

loans.name: Roda

texts.en:
Roda is a married mother of three children. She keeps cattle and poultry for milk, eggs, and meat. On her one-acre piece of land, you will also find a granary, cereals, and over 50 trees. 

To make better income, Roda engages in cereal brokering, which involves arranging the logistics of getting farm produce from local farmers to their buyers. Over the ten years that she has been in the business, she has made an effort to build strong relationships because in this business, success depends on reputation.

Since she can arrange a sale more easily than regular farmers, Roda prefers to deal with larger volumes of produce. She is seeking a loan to build her inventory by buying more cereal produce from local farmers at competitive prices. She will use her understanding of the market conditions and prices to sell later at a profit. 

Your loan will help local farmers selling to Roda to focus on production, rather than sales. Roda’s family also stands to benefit greatly from the improved income and elevated livelihood. You can help Roda with the loan she needs and get her closer to accomplishing her dreams.

loans.use: to buy cereals

loans.name: Emilly

texts.en:
Emilly, who is 42 years old, is a charismatic young woman and a strong example of hard work. 

Emily is a farmer and salesperson who has access to many sellers throughout the food business. On her farm she keeps cows and has a small cash crop garden and trees. To earn additional income, Emily makes a commission on sales for which she helps arrange the logistics of getting farm produce from local farmers to their buyers. She has been doing this business for over a decade. She continually makes an effort to build strong relationships because reputation is everything in her line of work. 

Given that Emilly can arrange a sale more easily than regular farmers, she prefers to deal with larger volumes of produce. She is seeking a loan to buy more cereals produce from local farmers at fair prices and use her better understanding of the market conditions and prices to sell it at a profit. Your loan will help Emilly’s clients to focus on production rather than sales, and it will help her family to earn a better income to uplift their livelihood.

Support her dream by giving Emilly a loan!

loans.use: to buy cereals from farmers to resell

loans.name: Nestor Ruben

texts.es:
El señor Nestor  pertenece al banco “SILKINCHANY” , el tiene 42 años y se dedica a distribuir gaseosas y cerveza .

El socio tiene 3 hijos, es por ellos que el  lucha a diario y su deseo es salir adelante junto con ellos.

El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas y cerveza, para ampliar su negocio.

Nestor está contento y agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por el crédito y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente.
el señor Nestor al momento de sacarle la foto cerro los ojos.
texts.en:
Nestor belongs to the Silkinchany bank. He is 42 years old and works selling soft drinks and beer.

The borrower has 3 children, and it is for them that he struggles daily and his desire is to get ahead with them.

The borrower asks for the loan to purchase soft drinks and beer to expand his business.

Nestor is happy and grateful to the Kiva investors for the loan and promises to make his payments punctually.

Nestor, when the photo was taken, closed his eyes.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and beer.

loans.name: Perline

texts.fr:
Perline est âgée de 51ans, elle est mariée. Elle a 8 enfants dont trois sont scolarisés (11-13-14 ans) et les cinq  autres sont déjà mariés. 
La petite unité de poissonnerie a été créée en 2000. L’activité lui convient car le marché est assuré malgré sa saisonnalité. Le développement de l’activité dépend de la qualité des poissons. L’activité est la principale source de revenus du ménage depuis 15 ans. Son mari exerce également la même activité mais les points de vente sont différents. 
Elle est propriétaire de sa maison et elle aime aider ses petits-enfants. Elle a pour objectif de devenir grossiste en poisson d’eau douce et de pouvoir construire une maison pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Perline is 51 years old and married. She has 8 children, three of whom (aged 11, 13, and 14) attend school and 5 of whom are already married.

Her small fishmonger's was created in 2000. She likes the work because the business is secure, despite its seasonality. The growth of the business depends on the quality of the fish. The business has been the household's main source of income for 15 years. Her husband also works in the business, but at different points of sale.

She owns her own home and likes to help her grandchildren. Her goal is to become a wholesaler of fresh water fish and to be able to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to buy dried fresh water fish.

loans.name: Argemiro Manuel

texts.es:
Argemiro es un artesano de 40 años de edad, una persona luchadora y pujante que con su trabajo no solo genera ingresos con los cuales mantiene a su familia, también es una lucha por conservar esa hermosa tradición que ha tenido su familia, fabricando principalmente sombreros.
La temporada de fin de año hay muchos visitantes que gustan muchos de estos accesorios artesanales, por ello Argemiro se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar caña canto-flecha que es el material del cual están hechos.
Será para preparar cantidades de sombrero, esperando venderlos todos en la temporada de fin de año.
texts.en:
Argemiro is a 40-year-old craftsman, a determined and driven person who, with his work, not only generates income with which to support his family, but it also is a struggle to conserve this lovely tradition that he has had in his family, primarily making hats.

In the end of the year season, there are many visitors who like these crafts a lot, so Argemiro is asking for a loan to purchase canto-flecha reed, which is the material from which they are made.

It will be to make large numbers of hats, hoping to sell them all in the end of the year season.

loans.use: to purchase canto-flecha reeds to make hats in large numbers.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El Señor Miguel habita en la cominidad de la libertad al Orinte de Honduras,  convive con su familia, es padre de 4 hijos,  y se dedica a la Agricultura y Ganaderia, desde hace 15 años su propiedad esta hubicada en un lugar muy bueno para estas actividades.
Don Miguel solicita el prestamo para la ferilizacion de su finca y asi obtener una mejor cosecha.
Don Miguel su sueños es producir el grano aromatico de la mejor calidad posible con esto tener buen producto para vender a un mejor precio y ayudar a su familia a tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Trojes Honduras - octubre del 2015
texts.en:
Miguel lives with his family in the community of La Libertad in eastern Honduras. He has four children. He has been making a living in agriculture and raising cattle for 15 years. His property is located in a place well-suited for these activities.

Miguel is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for his plantation so that he can have a better harvest.

Miguel's dream in to produce aromatic coffee beans of the best quality possible so that he has a good product to sell at a better price. In this way, he can help his family have a better quality of life.

Trojes, Honduras - October, 2015

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his land so that he can produce better coffee beans.

loans.name: Monica Paola

texts.es:
Mónica es una mujer de 31 años de edad que vive en unión libre con su pareja con la cual tiene 4 hijos de 13, 11, 10 y 16, ella es una mujer humilde que vive en una zona de postconflicto, lucha día a día por salir adelante, por cambiar su realidad, porque sus hijos estudien, sean alguien en la vida.
La cliente se dedica a la venta de mercancía por catálogo, por un apoyo tuyo puede hacer un gran cambio e incentivar y aumentar las ventas, solicita un préstamo para comprar una vitrina y un pequeño surtido de productos de uso personal, tendrá la oportunidad de vender en su hogar y vender a domicilio con su revista.
texts.en:
Mónica is a 31-year-old woman who lives in a common-law marriage with her partner, with whom she has 4 children, ages 13, 11, 10 and 16. She is a humble woman who lives in a post-conflict zone, she struggles day to day to get ahead, to change her reality, because her children go to school to be someone in life.

The client works selling merchandise from catalogs, with your support she can make a big change and stimulate and increase her sales. She asks for a loan to purchase a display case and a small assortment of personal products. It will be an opportunity to sell in her home and sell at others' houses with her catalog.

loans.use: to stock up on personal products, she hopes to generate more income to feed her family.

loans.name: Justine

texts.fr:
Tojosoa Nicolas est âgé de 25 ans, il est marié légalement. Il a un fils  d’un an et dix mois. Sa femme tient une gargote chaque dimanche et aide sa mère pendant les jours ouvrables. 
Il est à son 2eme prêt. Avant il a déjà opéré des services de photocopie mais son imprimante est hors service et il a abandonné. L’activité consiste à introduire des chansons dans les téléphones, et charger des batteries. Le marché de l’ activité qui a démarré en 2013 est encore porteur dans le village car la concurrence est encore faible.
Le ménage ne paie pas de loyer,  il se loge dans une maison héritée de ses parents. Il a d’autres activités secondaires. Parfois,  il répare les ordinateurs, dès fois il  travaille comme chauffeur. Il a pour but d’acquérir un terrain pour y construire une maison et réaliser d’autres investissements.
texts.en:
Tojosoa Nicolas is 25 years old and legally married. He has a son who is one year and 10 months old. His wife runs a canteen each Sunday and helps her mother during the weekdays.

This is his 2nd loan. He has previously provided photocopying services but his photocopier has stopped working and he has discarded it. His business consists of putting songs onto phones and charging batteries. His business, which he started in 2013, is still promising as there is still little competition in the village.

His household does not pay rent and lives in a house he inherited from his parents. He also has other side-businesses; sometimes he fixes computers, sometimes he works as a driver. His aim is to buy a plot of land on which to build a house, and to make further investments.

loans.use: to buy phone accessories and memory cards.

loans.name: Yorleny Aracely

texts.es:
La joven Yorleny de 22 años de edad es madre soltera  y vive con su familia  en casa de sus padres,  se dedica desde hace 02  años al negocio de venta de ropa  usada, etc.
Yorleny sus clientes son todos sus vecinos amistades y personas de las comunidades vecinas, vive al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Yorleny está solicitando el préstamo para compra de ropa como vende pantalones, camisas, chores, bóxer, licras, camisetas, vestidos, faldas, etc. con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo  con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras-   Octubre del  2015.
texts.en:
Yorleny is 22 years old. She is a single mother and lives with her family in her parents' house. For two years, she has worked selling used clothes, etc.

Yorleny's customers are her neighbors, friends and people from the nearby communities. She lives in southern Honduras. She is an enterprising woman who wants to get ahead and fight day to day to improve her quality of life.

Yorleny is asking for the loan to buy clothing such as pants, shorts, shorts, boxers, yoga pants, t-shirts, skirts, etc. With the help of this loan, she intends to improve her income and her quality of life. She is a new client who wants to work with apoyo Prisma.

Her dream is to have a good business and improve her and her family's quality of life.



San Lorenzo, Honduras- October, 2015.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, shorts, bozers, yoga pants, t-shirts, dresses, dresses, skirts, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Justine

texts.fr:
Justine  a 50 ans, elle est mariée. Elle a 5 enfants (31-28-25-23-18 ans). Les trois premiers sont mariés. La fille de 18 ans travaille comme gens de maison. Le nombre d’arrières petits enfants est de huit dont un vit avec elle. Son mari travaille dans un abattoir. 
Elle est actuellement à son 4ème prêt. elle produit et vend des amuses gueules (beignets et fritures). elle vend aussi des fruits. De 2010 à ce jour, elle entreprend ces activités. Avant, elle s’adonnait à la vente de friperie, activité qu’elle a abandonnée en raison de sa faible rentabilité par rapport à l’activité actuelle. En plus, son mari travaille  dans un abattoir, donc l’approvisionnement en viande est régulier et facile.  En cas de difficultés financières, la famille s’entraide. 
Elle ne paie pas de loyer. Son objectif est l’extension de la maison actuelle qui est en bois : construction d’une maison en brique  en 2016.
texts.en:
Justine is 50 years old and is married. She has 5 children aged 31, 28, 25, 23, and 18. The first three are married. Her 18-year-old daughter works as a domestic servant. She has 8 great-grandchildren, one of whom lives with her. Her husband works in a slaughterhouse.

This is her 4th loan. She makes and sells snacks (doughnuts and other fried foods). She also sells fruit. She has been in this line of work since 2010. Previously, she sold second-hand clothing but stopped because that business was less profitable than the one she is running now. Additionally, her husband works in a slaughterhouse, therefore it is easy to get regular supply of meat. In case of financial difficulties, the family members help each other.

She does not pay rent. Her goal is to extend her current home, which is made out of wood, and to build a brick house in 2016.

loans.use: to buy sausages, black pudding, cassavas, potatoes, bananas, pineapples, tamarind, and mangoes.

loans.name: María Rosalia

texts.es:
María, de 57 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, está divorciada y tiene tres hijos, de los cuales dos están acompañados y una vive con ella, además de dos nietos viven también con ella y estudian.

María, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace cinco años, el trabajo lo aprendió por iniciativa propia, porque tenía que generar ingresos suficientes para proveer lo necesario para sus hijos; actualmente la venta de ropa la realiza de manera ambulante y recorre 3 kilómetros cuatro veces a la semana para vender; pero su hija y sus nietos le ayudan a cargar la maleta de ropa para que ella no haga mucho esfuerzo.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, faldas, camisetas, calcetines y ropa interior porque se acerca la temporada de fin de año y ella desea aprovechar estas fechas para generar más ingresos.
 
María, sueña con ver a sus nietos graduarse de la universidad y también sueña con ver crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
María, aged 57, completed school up to the third grade. She is divorced, and three children, two of whom have partners, while the third lives with her. She also has two grandchildren at school who live with her.

María has been selling clothing for the last 5 years. She began the business herself, in order to earn sufficient income to support her children. She is a street-seller, and makes a 3-kilometre journey four times a week. Her daughter and grandchildren help her to load the clothing so that she doesn't have to carry too much.

María is requesting the loan to buy pants, skirts, shirts, socks and underwear, because the end of the year is approaching and she wants to make the most of the holidays to increase her earnings.

María dreams of seeing her grandchildren graduate from university, and of being able to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy pants, skirts, shirts, socks and underwear to sell.

loans.name: Julio Ramon

texts.es:
El socio Julio  pertenece al banco “SILKINCHANY” , el tiene 20 años , y trabaja vendiendo tortas en una empresa privada. Este trabajo le permite aprender mucho de negocios, es por ello que él quiere tener un negocio propio.
El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar pasteles y tortas. Que le permitan vender y producir de mejor manera, Para salir adelante y tener  una mejor calidad de vida.
Julio está contento y agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA  por confiar en él y darle el crédito y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente en los plazos acordados.
texts.en:
Julio belongs to the “SILKINCHANY” bank. He is 20 years old and he works selling cakes in a private business. This work allows him to learn a lot about business, and that is why he wants to have his own business.

He is asking for the loan to buy pastries and cakes. This will allow him to sell and produce in a better manner, so that he can get ahead and have a better quality of life.

Julio is happy and thankful to the Kiva investors for trusting him and giving him the loan. He is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy pastries and cakes.

loans.name: Yini Orlando

texts.es:
El Señor Yini tiene 30 años de edad habita en la cominidad de Rio Frio al Orinte de Honduras,  convive con su esposa, es padre de 1 hijo,  y se dedica a la Agricultura y Caficultura, desde hace 6 y años su propiedad esta hubicada en un lugar muy bueno para estas actividades ya que hace un buen clima para el cultivo de café.
Yini solicita el prestamo para la ferilizacion de su finca y asi obtener una mejor cosecha para obtener un mejor precio y una venta rapida de sus frutos de café.
Yini su sueños es que su finca cresca aun mas y seguir produciendo una mejor cosecha cada año Ser diferente en cuanto a su a produccion ademas de enfocar su sueño en mejorar sus ingresos para darle a su hijo lo mejor.

Trojes Honduras - Octubre del 2015
texts.en:
Yini is 30 years old. he lives in the community of Rio Frio in eastern Honduras. He lives with his wife and he is the father of 1 child. He has worked as a farmer and coffee grower for 6 years. His property is located in a very good place for these activities because it has a good climate for growing coffee.

Yini is asking for the loan to fertilize his farm and thus obtain a better harvest for a better price and quick sale of his coffee yield.

Yini's dream is to expand his farm even more and continue producing a better harvest every year, have a better yield and focus on improving his income to give his son the best.



Trojes, Honduras - October, 2015

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his land.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
El Señor Juan, tiene 42 años de edad habita en la cominidad de la libertad al Orinte de Honduras,  convive con su familia, es padre de 3 hijos,  y se dedica a la Agricultura y Caficultura, desde hace 6 y años su propiedad esta hubicada en un lugar muy bueno para estas actividades.
Don Juan solicita el prestamo para la ferilizacion de su finca y asi obtener una mejor cosecha con esto tener mejores frutos de café para obtener un mejor precio a la hora de vender su cosecha.
Don Juan su sueños es que su finca cresca aun mas y seguir produciendo una mejor cosecha cada año para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Trojes Honduras - Octubre del 2015
texts.en:
Juan, aged 42, lives with his family in the town of La Libertad, in the east of Honduras. He has 3 children, and has been working in agriculture and coffee-production for the last 6 years. The area where his farm is located is ideal for these activities.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers so that he can improve his coffee crop, and obtain a better price at market.

Juan dreams of extending his farm, and being able to improve his crops every year so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

Trojes, Honduras - October 2015

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his coffee plants.

loans.name: Elsa Dorotea

texts.es:
La señora Elsa de 65  años de edad es madre  soltera  y  vive con sus hijos e hijas en su  casa propia,  se dedica desde hace 10 años al negocio de venta de helados como conos, paletas de varios sabores, rellenas de chocolate y vasitos de helado preparado, también vende cajas de helado por mayor.
Doña Elsa sus clientes son todos sus vecinos amistades y personas de las comunidades vecinas, vive en una aldea de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Elsa está solicitando el préstamo para compra de más productos como conos, paletas, rellenos y surtir su negocio para los tiempos buenos que se acercan de navidad, piensa comprar varias cajas de helado con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo  con deseos de trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Octubre del  2015.
texts.en:
Elsa, aged 65, is a single mother, and lives with her children in her own home. She has been running her ice-cream business for the last 10 years, and sells cones, popsicles in different flavors, chocolate-filled cones, and ice-cream desserts. She also sells ice-cream in bulk.

Elsa's customers are friends, neighbors and people from nearby towns and villages. She lives in the town of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras, and is a determined woman who works hard to get ahead and improve her quality of life.

Elsa is requesting a loan to be able to buy more stock, including cones, popsicles, fillings, cases of ice-cream, etc. so that she can make the most of the Christmas period. With this support, she can increase her earnings and improve her quality of life, She is a new client, and is keen to work with Prisma (one of Kiva's field partners).

Her dream is to have a solid business, gain more customers and be able to enjoy a better future with her family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – October 2015.

loans.use: to buy cones, popsicles, fillings for her ice-cream business.

loans.name: Rosa Cándida

texts.es:
Rosa, de 54 años de edad, estudió técnico en trabajo social, está casada y su esposo es astrónomo, juntos han procreado tres hijas, las cuales están estudiando en la universidad.  

Rosa, tiene 3  años de dedicarse a su negocio de venta de ropa nueva americana en el mercado.- Anteriormente, ella vendía productos de revistas y la venta de ropa la aprendió porque su prima le prestó el local en el mercado y fue así como decidió dedicarse a este negocio y el mercado está a 15 minutos de su casa y su horario de venta es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. 

Rosa, necesita el préstamo para comprar más ropa de hombre y de niñas; porque se le agoto y los clientes buscan bastante este tipo de ropa y actualmente en su municipio están las fiestas patronales y se vende más la ropa.

Su sueño es, tener un local más grande y con más variedad de ropa.
texts.en:
Rosa, aged 54, studied social work. She is married to an astronomer, and has three children, all of whom are studying at university.

Rosa has run her business selling new American clothing in the market for the last 3 years. Previous, she had a catalog sales business, but began the clothing business after her cousin lent her a market stall. The market is located 15 minutes from her house and her stall is open from 7am to 4pm.

Rosa is requesting a loan to buy more clothing for men and children, as she has no more stock and there is a lot of demand for this type of clothing. At the moment, her town festival is taking place, and more clothing is purchased during this period.

Her dream is to have larger premises and be able to stock a wider range of clothing.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for men and children.

loans.name: Riinya

texts.en:
Riinya is an ambitious, 52-year-old lady from the Mikumbuni location, which is a luxuriant banana-producing region in Central province of Kenya.

Riinya is very passionate, hardworking, and eager to learn and take new challenges. These qualities have propelled her to become one of the most respected farmers in her village. She sells milk, poultry and vegetables produced on her farm. She also engages in a personal business to make ends meet.

Riinya is a go-getter and has a great desire to succeed in life. Of all the activities in which she involves herself, dairy farming is closest to her heart. She enjoys waking up every morning to go and milk her cows and feed them with fodder that has high nutrient value. She is so keen and close with her cows, she has named them, which makes Riinya very proud, and she feels fulfilled.

Riinya is seeking an education loan to pay school fees for her four children. She believes that the knowledge and skills her children will get from school will help them have a brighter future. Donate $25 towards this loan and empower her children’s life.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees for her  children.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a responsible, respectable, hardworking, honorable and honest woman who dedicates her life to raising her children, who mean everything to her.

Gladys enjoys farming, which she has been doing on her small piece of land for the past 10 years. Through all those years, she has gained much experience and is one of the most respected farmers in her village. Because of the immense knowledge that she has of farming, Gladys offers extension services to other farmers who are new in the business.

Being a caring and loving mum, Gladys has been able to take care of her family and support them through the profits she has earned from farming.

Gladys has a vision of owning a large cereal-selling shop. She is requesting a loan for 50,000 KES, which she will use to start the shop.

Her projections are that, by the end of the first year, she would be able to open another cereal-selling shop, which means more income and improved living conditions. Through the profits generated from the business, she will be able to repay the loan and provide a secure future for her children and husband. Lend to her to keep her big smile.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 25 years old and has two children. She resides in Nandihills, Kenya. She has been practicing farming for five years on her small plot, where she does dairy and crop farming.

Ruth enjoys farming very much, and every day she wakes up to go to the farm and improve her life. Through farming, she has been able to take care of her large family and provide them with their basic needs.

Ruth has a vision of owning a large cereal-selling shop. She is requesting a loan for 40,000 KES, which she will use to start the shop. With the loan, Ruth will be able to improve her income level and to take care of her family.

Her projections are that, by the end of the first year, she would be able to open another cereal-selling shop, which means more income and improved living conditions.

Through the profits generated from the business, she will be able to repay the loan and provide a secure future for her children and husband.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Dúo San Rafael Group

texts.es: Dúo San Rafael, se integra  por la señora, Ana Gricelda originaria del municipio de San Juan Sacatepéquez  de 37 años de edad,  y madre de 3 niños  de 11 9 y 6 años,  doña Ana se  dedica al comercio desde  hace 8 años actualmente vende de forma ambulante  ofreciendo a su clientela colchas, edredones, cubre camas, blusas, suéteres, ropa para adulto, también cuenta con la venta de joyería de oro  Brasileño, venta de lociones de marcas muy conocidas.ella desea mas capital para invertir un poco mas ya que para ella ya se acercan los meses de mas demanda de ropa en la que sabe que puede tener mejores ganancias y así beneficio para su negocio.
texts.en:
The San Rafael Duo includes Mrs. Ana, a 37 year old mother of 3 children (ages 11, 9 and 6) from the San Juan Sacatepequez municipality. Mrs. Ana has been making a living in commerce for the past 8 years. She currently sells as a traveling merchant, offering her clients bedspreads, duvets, bedding, blouses, sweaters and adult clothing. She also supplements by selling Brazilian gold jewelry and well known brand lotions.
She wishes to have more capital to invest a bit more, since the high clothing demand months approach and she knows she can earn a better income and this way benefit her business.

loans.use: purchase clothing to sell.

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a 35-year-old woman from the Trans-Nzoia district of Kenya. She is married and they have two children. The youngest child is 11 years while the oldest is 17 years.

Judith has been a farmer for as long as she has been a wife. She operates on a small piece of land under her husband's name, keeping dairy and poultry and growing crops and trees.

Judith is seeking a small loan of KES 20,000 to pay for farm implements. Working with modern tools will make her work move faster and become more efficient. She expects to see major improvements in the quality and quantity of yields through the use of improved tools.

loans.use: to pay for farm implements.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha has no higher education or work experience, only her wits and her desire to succeed in life. She is a very hardworking, progressive, and honest farmer from a very remote village in Kibirichia in the Nkubu area of Kenya. This area is very fertile, with favorable weather patterns that support farming activities.

Martha is happily married and the proud mother of four children, and together they live on a small piece of land that she really treasures. Her primary sources of income are eggs and milk.

Although this humble and industrious mother makes a profit, she faces the challenge of not being able to produce enough to meet the ready market that is available.

Therefore, she is seeking funds from Kiva lenders to buy farm inputs like good fertilizer and good quality seeds.

Through this loan, she will double her production, and this will translate into increased income. She then intends to save more money in the future so that she can develop her farming. This loan will help Martha to realize her dream of getting out of poverty, and she will be able to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs like fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Hello Kiva lenders! Meet Gladys, a hardworking, dedicated and honest 44-year-old dairy farmer. As the key breadwinner of her family, with a husband and two children, she farms a small plot of land in the green, lush hills of Kitale, in the Rift valley region of Kenya.

For the past five years, she has been practicing mixed farming and her primary sources of income have been milk, eggs and crop selling. She also engages in a small business to supplement the meager income she earns through farming.

Gladys passionately loves dairy farming, but the biggest challenge she faces is not being able to produce enough to meet the ready market that is available because of having a poorly built dairy unit. She also has poor productivity in her farm.

She is requesting a loan to build a modern dairy unit and to buy farm inputs. Through the loan she will buy farm inputs like good fertilizer and good quality seeds. Through this loan, she will double her production, and this will translate into increased income.

With the loan, Gladys will be able to build a modern dairy unit, which will increase her income from milk selling and her cows will have more food to eat and never reject food. The key to high yield in milk production is proper feeding of the cows and through this loan, Gladys will achieve this.

An increase in income will allow Gladys to improve her living conditions and secure the future of her children. Her dream is to continue improving her dairy breeds and increase milk productivity to achieve better living standards. Gladys fears that her dreams might not be realized if Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva lenders cease to provide their reliable market channel, credit facility and services that she requires to grow her dairy enterprise.

You can help Gladys to be closer to her goals, and a loan will do that.

loans.use: to build a modern dairy unit and to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Jose Emilio

texts.es:
El Señor Jose tiene 44 años de edad habita en la cominidad de la Libertad al Orinte de Honduras,  convive con su esposa, es padre de 2 hijos,  y se dedica a la Agricultura y Caficultura, desde hace 7 y años su propiedad esta hubicada en un lugar muy bueno para estas actividades con un clima agradable y para obtener buena cosecha.
Don Jose solicita el prestamo para la ferilizacion de su finca y asi obtener una mejor cosecha, y asi mismo alargarle la vida a su finca de Café ya que con el tiempo las plantas de café y la tierra se vuelven viejas y se tiene que estar renovando.
Don Jose su sueño es ser un buen productor y con el prestamo obtener mejores Ganancias para disfrutarlas con sus hijos y su esposa.

Trojes Honduras - Octubre del 2015
texts.en:
Mr. Jose is 44 years old and lives in the LIbertad community in the East of Honduras. He lives with his wife, is the father of 2 children, and has been making a living in agriculture and coffee cultivation for the past 7 years. His property is located in a really good place for these activities, with a pleasant climate suitable for obtaining good harvests.

Mr. Jose is requesting the loan to fertilize his farm and in this way obtain a better harvest. This way he will extend the life of his coffee farm considering that, with time, the coffee plants and the land age and must be renovated.

Mr Jose's dream is to be a good producer and, with the loan, obtain better earnings to enjoy with his children and his wife.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers for his land and his coffee

loans.name: Peninah

texts.en:
Peninah, 33 years old, is very clear about what she wants in life and determined to get ahead and have a good life.

Peninah is a married mother of one child. She runs a half-acre mixed farm. She has dairy cows, poultry, cash crops, and over 50 trees. With all these activities, however, Peninah could not make enough income to meet her family's basic needs. Therefore, she started a cereal trading business. Basically, she arranges the logistics of getting farm produce from local farmers to their buyers.

The borrowed money will be used to buy more cereal produce from local farmers; the larger the stock, the more the income.

The impact of your loan will be felt by both her family and other farmers in her village. By using her better understanding of the market conditions and prices, she will be able to sell much easier, and this will free her suppliers to focus more on production. Income from this trade will help Peninah to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer acompañada, vive con su linda familia y dice no tener ayuda económica del extranjero, su negocio desde hace 15 años es atender una venta de tortillas, el horario que ella tiene para trabajar es de seis de la mañana a seis de la tarde, con ello tiene recursos para apoyar en los gastos familiares.
Ella compra materia prima como: maíz, leña, cal y bolsas para elaborar la venta de tortillas, tendrá abastecido su inventario y atenderá mejor a sus clientes, la esperanza de Juana es tener más clientes y mayor demanda de su producto para que las circunstancias económicas sean más estables.
Su objetivo es reparar la vivienda para compartir con su grupo familiar una vida más confortable.
texts.en:
Juana is an accompanied woman, she lives with her beautiful family and claims to not have any economic help from abroad. Her business for the past 15 years has been the sale of tortillas. Her work schedule is from six in the morning to six in the evening. Through this work she has resources to help support the family expenses.

She purchases ingredients such as: corn, firewood, lime and bags to execute the sale of tortillas. She will have a full inventory and attend to her clients better. Juana's hope is to have more clients and an increased demand for her product in order for the economic circumstances to become more stable.

Her objective is to repair the home to share with her family group a more comfortable life.

loans.use: purchase ingredients such as: corn, firewood, lime and bags to execute the sale of tortillas.

loans.name: Linet

texts.en:
Fifteen years ago, Linet started farming on a small, inherited piece of land in the Kitale area of Kenya. Today, this humble mother sells milk, eggs, maize and a variety of food crops. She is a passionate farmer and, because of her immense knowledge of farming, she commands a lot of respect from other farmers in her village.

Dairy farming is close to her heart, and every day she wakes up to milk her cow, and that makes her very proud.

Although she earns profit through milk sales, Linet lacks a proper dairy unit, and she is seeking a loan to build one. A good dairy unit provides a sheltering place where cows can relax and it also helps to protect them from diseases that may arise if they are exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain.

Linet believes that, through this loan, her living conditions will change because she is going to have an increase in milk production. She will save money that she used to spend on treating her cows because she lacked a good dairy unit. Linet has a strong conviction and she knows that, with the support of Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva lenders, her dreams will come true. Linet waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to construct a modern dairy unit.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice (with one of her small brothers above) started farming in 2007 after the country suffered post-election violence. With the unstinting support of her parents, who dedicated five acres, she has grown the business dramatically.

She has acquired numerous income-generating assets, including farm machines to help her run the farm. She keeps dairy cattle and grows subsistence and commercial crops, such as maize. She takes pride in being independent and being involved in a sector that feeds the population.

Beatrice is seeking a loan to purchase more land. Her operations are growing consistently, eating up the available space. With your funding, Beatrice will have more space to expand her business output.

The money from the investment will be ploughed back into the business, to finance even more growth. The additional income will also enable her to repay the loan, buy food for her parents, and pay fees for her siblings who are in public schools.

She feels blessed to have the support of her parents through all her undertakings. Make a $25 loan, and push Beatrice’s dream closer to reality.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Hello world, meet an amazing widow by the name of Agnes. She is a smallholder farmer based in Kathutha village in the Nyahururu area of Kenya. She has seven children who commute to school from home every school day.

Agnes has been practicing livestock farming for seven years to help cover family expenses since she is the only bread winner. She has managed to raise cows and poultry on the farm. She also makes extra money doing a side hustle business.

Agnes is seeking a loan to restock her cereals business. She plans to use your money to purchase and transport cereals in bulk to far markets, where she will sell at prices high enough to cover all the expenses incurred plus profit.

Agnes is confident that she will be able to repay the loan in time because she is hardworking and financially disciplined. Returns from the investment will change her life, as she will use the additional income to raise her family's living standards and pay for her children's education.

To do this she is counting on the lenders on the Kiva website. Help out this widow!

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
El señor  Fernando de 53 años de edad es casado, tiene  03 hijos  que depende de él, vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 21 años  al negocio de la ganadería cultivo de maíz, maicillo y cultivo de camarón. 
Don Fernando es una persona emprendedora, está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de fertilizantes, para su cultivo, espera con el apoyo de este crédito suplir su necesidad de financiamiento. Este es su tercer  crédito que solicita.
Don Fernando sueña con tener bien equipada su finca camaronera para que le de buenos ingresos y así tener una mejor forma de vida para él y su familia. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Octubre del 2015.
texts.en:
Fernando is 53 years old, married and has three children who depend on him. Fernando lives in a community in the south of Honduras. He owns his own house and, for 21 years, has worked in cattle-raising, shrimp farming and growing corn and sorghum.

Fernando is enterprising and applying for this loan in order to buy fertilisers for his crops. He hopes that the help of this loan will cover his financial needs. This is the third loan that Fernando has applied for.

Fernando dreams of his shrimp farm being well stocked. He can thus earn a good income from it and provide him and his family with a better quality of life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras; October 2015.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers for his business.

loans.name: Artemio

texts.es:
Artemio con 48 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y sus cuatro hijos, en el distrito de Callayuc,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Artemio se dedica a la agricultura, especificamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 10 años. Solicita préstamo para la compra de abonos y invertir en el mantenimiento de su finca.De esta manera obtendrá mayores rendimientos.

Artemio es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Artemio, age 48, is in a common-law marriage. He lives with his wife and their four children in the Callayuc district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca department, Peru. He has very good personal and work references. The inhabitants of this are work mainly in agriculture and commerce and with livestock.

Artemio is a farmer. Specifically, he grows coffee. He has ten years of experience in this field.

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and to invest in the maintenance of his farm. This way he will get greater yields.

Artemio is a returning member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to invest in the maintenance of his farm.

loans.name: Donis Manuel

texts.es:
Donis es un productor agrícola, residente del municipio de Sampues, una zona de postconflicto que tiene habitante como Donis que con trabajo honesto, emprendimiento buscan cambiar la cara de su municipio, su presente y tener un mejor futuro.
El empresario se dedica al negocio de venta de huevos, tiene su galón con las gallinas ponedoras, con la particularidad de que vende huevos de gallina criolla, los cuales son un poco más costosos pero con un mejor sabor.
Actualmente el cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para aumentar su producción de huevos, comprando más gallinas ponedoras.
Este hombre lucha por generar los recursos para su pareja con quien vive en unión libre y sus dos hijos de 5 y 7 años.
texts.en:
Donis is a farmer, and lives in the town of Sampués. This is located in a former war zone, and many of its inhabitants, like Donis, want to change the town through honest work and resourcefulness, and enjoy a better future.

This businessman sells eggs from Creole hens, which are a little more expensive than other eggs but have a better flavor. He is requesting a loan in order to buy more laying hens so that he can increase egg production.

Donis works very hard to be able to support his partner and his two children, aged 5 and 7.

loans.use: to buy more laying hens in order to increase egg production.

loans.name: Irvin Luis

texts.es:
El socio Irvin pertenece al banco “SILKINCHANY”, el tiene 21 años y es mecánico.
El socio es una persona trabajadora y luchadora, su deseo es tener un taller propio donde el pueda realizar su trabajo de mejor manera, y tener mas facilidades para salir a delante.
Irvin solicito el préstamo para comparase sus instrumentos de trabajo, para poder laborar de forma segura. El  utilizara el dinero para comprar desarmadores, gata mecánica y guantes.
El socio está agradecido con los inversionistas de KIVA por confiar en él y se compromete a cumplir sus cuotas del crédito puntualmente.
texts.en:
Irvin, a 21-year-old mechanic, belongs to the 'SILKINCHANY' village bank.

He is hard-working and determined, and dreams of having his own workshop with better facilities where he can do his job better and get ahead.

Irvin is requesting a loan to buy tools so that he can work safely. He will use the funds to buy screwdrivers, a mechanical jack and gloves.

He is grateful to Kiva investors for their support, and promises to make all his payments promptly.

loans.use: to buy screwdrivers, a mechanical jack and gloves.

loans.name: Jaime Patricia

texts.es: Jaime de 54 años es un microempresario que reside en compañía de su familia en Cartagena de Indias, él se dedica a la distribución e instalación de tuberías en PVC de diferentes calibres, oportunidad de negocio que palpó cuando laboraba en la gobernación de Bolívar en la dependencia de agua potable y consideró que le favorecería ser proveedor de tuberías.  Decidió ser trabajador independiente y emprender su propia microempresa en el año 2000 con excelentes resultados.  Hoy en día requiere de un capital para comprar tubos en PVC de los diferentes calibres: 4, 5 y 6 pulgadas, para cumplir con un contrato, es por ello que realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Jaime es padre de tres hijos mayores de edad y su meta es posicionar su negocio en el departamento.
texts.en:
Jaime, age 54, is a small businessman who lives with his family in Cartagena de Indias. He distributes and installs different sizes of PVC pipes. He noticed this work opportunity when he worked for the Bolívar government in the potable water unit. He thought that it would be better for him to be a pipe provider.

He decided to be an independent worker and to undertake his own small business in the year 2000 with excellent results.

He now needs capital to buy different sizes; 4, 5, and 6 inches, of PVC pipes in order to fill a contract. That is why he requested a Kiva loan, an opportunity to connect his financial life through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.

Jaime has three grown children, and his goal is position his business in the department.

loans.use: to buy different sizes; 4, 5, and 6 inches, of PVC pipes.

loans.name: Asiya

texts.en:
Asiya is a woman eager to get ahead. She is 33 years old and lives with her husband in the Kitale area of Kenya. Asiya is blessed with two children who are her greatest motivation in life. She perseveres because she wants to provide a better future for them. Asiya was unable to study to have a professional career because of the economic situation that her family faced. However, she never gave up and she has been a farmer for the past 10 years. Asiya also has a side business and runs a posho mill. 

Asiya has always had an affinity for farming and it runs in her blood. Because of how much she likes farming, she even nicknamed one of her cows. She is a very proud farmer, especially when she is milking her dairy cows. Asiya’s cows produce between 10-15 liters of milk each day which helps her support her family. She also cultivates crops, but she has not been making good profits because of poor inputs. 

Asiya is requesting a loan to purchase high quality seeds, good fertilizer, and pesticides that the will use to improve her crop production. Modern farming requires the use of modern techniques and good inputs. Using high-quality seeds will assure her of a bumper harvest and increased profit levels.  Asiya is very visionary, and her goal for the season is to boost her crop production and build a modern house. All this can be achieved through the help and goodwill of lenders. Asiya believes that, with her loan, she will turn around her family’s life and be able to give her children a solid educational background. This loan will be Asiya’s way out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy high quality seeds, good fertilizer, and pesticides to improve crop production

loans.name: Asenath

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Asenath, a very hardworking, energetic and honest mum who is 47 years of age. She lives in the rich highlands of Chuka with her husband and four children. Asenath has been practicing farming for the past 15 years and, through those years, she has been able to support her family. Her primary sources of income are eggs, vegetables and crop farming.

The Chuka area is populated and has a ready market for poultry products. However, Asenath's biggest challenge is lack of funds, which is why she is kindly seeking a loan to buy poultry.

Poultry farming is one of the profitable business ventures in Kenya and you don’t need to be a large scale farmer to benefit from it. Through the loan, Asenath will be able to sell eggs, meat and poultry feathers to the already existing market. The demand for chicken is always high, being such a popular meal for many people as can be proved when you visit fast food joints in her area.

Asenath has been facing challenges accessing finances but she feels relieved knowing that institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva are there to make her dream come true. Asenath chose Juhudi Kilimo because the interest rate on their loans is low and is on a reducing basis. Asenath underwent training through Juhudi Kilimo, learning that saving is a continuous process in many microfinance institutions. Through the loan, Asenath' income will increase and her life will permanently change, leading to better living conditions for her family and a positive impact to the community.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Beronica

texts.es:
Con mucha motivación, con todo el entusiasmo y ganas de superación, de alcanzar sus sueños, de mejorar sus condiciones de vida, Berónica quiere solicitar un préstamo y así iniciar su negocio, ella no tiene trabajo, tampoco logró encontrarlo, pero su afán y ganas de progreso no la dejan recaer.
Ella busca a toda costa tener un medio de ingreso, quiere ser útil, no solo estar en casa haciendo labores domésticas, busca sus propios recursos para satisfacer sus necesidades y deseos.
Si apoyas a esta empresaria, estarás a favor del emprendimiento, dicho impulso económico será usado en la compra de pollos, alimento de engorde y materiales para la construcción y adecuación de un galpón.
texts.en:
Motivated, enthusiastic, and wanting to do better and achieve her dreams and improve her living conditions, Beronica wants to apply for a loan and start a business. Although, she does not work and cannot find a job, her eagerness and willingness to progress will stop her from ever failing.

Beronica is looking to earn an income however she can. She wants to be useful and not just stay at home doing chores. She is looking to earn her own income to pay for the things that she needs and wants.

If you support this entrepreneur, you will be supporting this business venture. This loan will be used to buy chickens, feed and building materials to construct a hen coop.

loans.use: to buy chickens, feed and building materials to construct a hen coop.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Ruth, a young farmer from Kapsowar county in Kenya who has defied the common thinking of most Kenyans about agriculture. Ruth is a proud owner of a small parcel of land on which she has been practicing mixed farming for the past five years. Her primary sources of income have been milk, eggs and some variety of crops she plants. She also engages in some personal business to make ends meet.

Ruth passionately loves farming. She has been able to earn a decent income from farming and she attributes all this success to hard work and determination. Although she makes profits, she has always wanted to increase her farming and start a cereal-selling business. The main challenge she has been facing is lack of funds.

She is seeking a loan to buy cereals. Demand for cereals is overwhelming in Kapsowar and through your loan, she intends to buy different varieties of cereals and be able to satisfy the demand in her village and local market.

With your loan, Ruth will improve her living conditions through increased profits from selling cereals. Ruth has been practicing agriculture with a difference, employing youthful energy, enthusiasm and knowledge attained through training from Juhudi Kilimo and she believes that her cereal-selling business will increase in leaps and bounds. There is no doubt that through your loan Ruth's life is permanently going to change and she will assure her school-going children a secure future.

loans.use: To buy cereals

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is an eloquent speaker with a strong, commanding manner. She resides in Kimilili, a remote village in the lush hills of Kitale, in the Rift Valley of Kenya. As the key breadwinner of her family, with a handsome husband and three children, she has been practicing mixed farming for the past 10 years.

Because of the immense knowledge she has of farming, she commands a lot of respect from other farmers in her village. Her primary source of income have been milk, eggs and crop farming. She also engages in a small business to supplement the meager income she earns through farming. Although she has been making profits from farming, she has identified a “niche market” for selling cereals; the only big challenge she faces is lack of funds.

She is requesting a loan to buy cereals. She intends to buy different varieties of cereals; that is, maize, sorghum, rice, wheat, barley, and millet, to sell in the local market. Market for the cereals is never a problem because the demand is always high, and she plans to take advantage of that.

Because of the good relationship she has with her neighbors, she plans to increase her market by using word of mouth to reach more customers and markets. Judith is an inspiration to many farmers in her village. She plans that, through accumulated profits, she will be able to buy a milling machine for grinding maize. Through this loan, Judith’s life will take another turn, and she will be able to secure the future of her children.

loans.use: To buy cereals

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas is a woman eager to get ahead. She is 52 years old and lives with her husband and nine children in the Kitale area of Kenya. Dorcas perseveres because she wants to provide a better future for her children. She has been a farmer for the past 20 years. Dorcas has always had an affinity for farming and it runs in her blood. Because of how much she likes farming she even nicknamed one of her cows. Dorcas is a very proud farmer, especially when she is milking her cows. Her cows produce between 10-15 liters of milk each day which helps her support her family. She also practices crop farming but she has not been making good profits because of poor farming inputs.
